channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Scaffold lorry again blocking road., 2nd February
item.description:
Scaffold lorry once again fully and dangerously blocking Bastion Road,SE2. These workmen believe to be working on “Council Flats” in Bastion Road. Not only are they totally blocking Bastion Road but they are forcing any vehicle that turns into Bastion Road to dangerously illegally reverse back out into BOSTAL Hill . This needs a ENFORCEMENT OFFICER sent immediately.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Bastion Road, Abbey Wood
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Confusing crossing sounds, 2nd February
item.description:
The lights at waterloo roundabout are a concern. There are two crossings close by. The pink one beeps but the yellow one doesnt. You can clearly hear the pink beep at the yellow one and a colleague had almost stepped out into traffic many times from hearing the wrong beep.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Sutton Walk, Waterloo, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 15 Hoxton Square: Items dumped in the common area - old boiler and radiator, 2nd February
item.description:
